abstract: Preet Bharara, United States attorney for Southern District of New York, announces indictment of Navnoor Kang, former portfolio manager responsible for investing New York State employee retirement funds, on bribery charges; Kang is also charged, along with two brokers, with conspiring to submit false testimony to Securities and Exchange Commission investigators in matter.

keywords.value: New York State Common Retirement Fund
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Cocaine and trips were among lures accepted by a portfolio manager of a New York State employee retirement portfolio, an indictment of the three says.
snippet: Cocaine and trips were among lures accepted by a portfolio manager of a New York State employee retirement portfolio, an indictment of the three says....

headline.main: Official Took Bribes to Steer Pension Funds to Brokers, U.S. Says
headline.print_headline: Bribery Charge for Pension Fund Official
